attributes.review: This app is terrible, it has no educational, strategical nor entertainment benefits towards myself and that of others. I have used this app many times and it does not work. And don’t even get me started about the glitches. When I downloaded this app my phone went bazurk, I had to delete it right after. I hate this app and it doesn’t even work.
attributes.title: WORSG APP IN THE WORLD

attributes.review: This app is the total worst. So I was drawing and then the girl from the ring (the horror movie) appeared on front of me, then after a few days a dog came to my house saying that he was going to steal my alcohol markers and he was going to wrinkle my art. I will not recommend this app at all, If I could I will give it 0 stars. Also yesterday an ant started talking to me and said that this app was thrash too.
attributes.title: THIS IS TERRIBLE

attributes.review: So i got the app to see what it was all about but all i found was a button to continue the wall and deport everyone except Americans which i found very horrific and saddening since i know people who live across the border which means that i would never see them again. I was never going to vote for Trump but know i have reasoning that he is the worst president ever!
attributes.title: Very Bad App

attributes.review: I mean he’s supposedly “Amazing, great, the most fantastic president you’ll ever see”, finding that hard to believe with this app. First off I kept hearing guys whispers coming from my phone following the download, couldn’t hear exactly what it was but I know they were in the locker room. Then the voices started becoming louder, demanding even, telling me that I need to drink Clorox to prevent the rona.
attributes.title: Shocked but not surprised

attributes.review: I downloaded this app five days ago and ever since then my family and I have only known fear. We keep seeing shadows out of the corner of our eyes. Strange noises keep us up at night. My brother chewed four fingers off the other night because, and I quote, “the scary orange man told me to.” I have no choice but to delete this app. We can’t take the torment any more.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrifying!

attributes.review:
This app is horrible everytime I open it!!!
 Everytime I open it it glitches and brings me back to my home screen !! I tried opening it this week and it kicked me out then it got my phone disabled for 4 hours 😤 not to mention I turned off the notifications and still got them. You shouldn’t even bother fixing the app might as well DELETE IT !
attributes.title: WROST APP EVER

attributes.review:
I am truly offended by this app. It is gross to even think that somebody would think to make this the way it is made. Yeah you should this app if YOUR ATTRACTED TO PUFFY CHEETOS. You should really rethink the platform of this app I was sitting in my chair and suddenly I was like I should get this app once I did it already asked for private information DISGUSTING. I was scared I could get hacked don’t buy this app it will bite your toenails. 
WHERE IS THE OBAMA APP.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING APP

attributes.review: please never download this app. as a supporter of our totally non racist, homophobic, transphobic ect president 🌚😌😻💫✨ i thought this app would suit my need to keep up with information but i was sadly disappointed when 2 days after downloading my cat was diagnosed with aids.   👁👄👁 and this app is the whole reason why. so please listen and educate yourself of this app. god bless ‘merica 🥵🙈😻✨💫🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: this app gave my cat aids. TRUE STORY.

attributes.review: First of all, it put a virus on my phone and it made me loose all of my photos in my camera roll. The app is so creepy and scary it gave me nightmares for like a week. It also ate my cat and my dog, which I’m really upset about. DO NOT GET THE APP!! I downloaded this app and had a seizure, and had to go to the hospital and almost died. So definitely don’t recommend it. Sorry!! VerRRYYY disgusting!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever, don’t get it!!!🙄🤬😡

attributes.review: I really wanted to support our dear President, but I find this app a little sketchy. Why would it know my location even when I’m not using the app??? What happened to privacy in America? I just love this country so much and I just really, really, really, wanted to get this app. But uh yea this is not the move my fellow troompa loompas. Let’s do better✨👁👄👁🧚🏼✨🤩
attributes.title: I always feel like somebody’s watching me...
